TEXT.TITLE: CALIFORNIA ENERGY <CECI> GETS FINANCING
TEXT.BODY:
California Energy Co said it received 3.5 mln dlrs in private financing from a European investment group to support further development by China Lake Joint Venture of geothermal energy resources located on lands at China Lake, Calif.
Reuter
